api.description: The version of SpaceAPI your endpoint uses

address.description: The postal address of your space (street, block, housenumber, zip code, city, whatever you usually need in your country, and the country itself)

lat.description: Latitude of your space location, in degree with decimal places. Use positive values for locations north of the equator, negative values for locations south of equator.

lon.description: Longitude of your space location, in degree with decimal places. Use positive values for locations west of Greenwich, and negative values for locations east of Greenwich.

cam.description: URL(s) of webcams in your space

stream.description: A mapping of stream types to stream URLs. Example: <samp>{'mp4':'http//example.org/stream.mpg', 'mjpeg':'http://example.org/stream.mjpeg'}</samp>

open.description: A boolean which indicates if the space is currently open

status.description: An additional free-form string, could be something like <samp>'open for public'</samp>, <samp>'members only'</samp> or whatever you want it to be

lastchange.description: The Unix timestamp when the space status changed most recently

events.description: Events which happened recently in your space and which could be interesting to the public, like 'User X has entered/triggered/did something at timestamp Z'

name.description: Name or other identity of the subject (e.g. <samp>J. Random Hacker</samp>, <samp>fridge</samp>, <samp>3D printer</samp>, …)

type.description: Action (e.g. <samp>check-in</samp>, <samp>check-out</samp>, <samp>finish-print</samp>, …). Define your own actions and use them consistently, canonical actions are not (yet) specified

t.description: Unix timestamp when the event occurred

extra.description: A custom text field to give more information about the event

phone.description: Phone number, including country code with a leading plus sign. Example: <samp>+1 800 555 4567</samp>

sip.description: URI for Voice-over-IP via SIP. Example: <samp>sip:yourspace@sip.example.org</samp>

keymaster.description: Phone numbers of people who carry a key and are able to open the space upon request. Example: <samp>['+1 800 555 4567','+1 800 555 4544']</samp>

irc.description: URL of the IRC channel, in the form <samp>irc://example.org/#channelname</samp>

email.description: E-mail address for contacting your space

ml.description: The e-mail address of your mailing list. If you use Google Groups then the e-mail looks like <samp>your-group@googlegroups.com</samp>.

jabber.description: A public Jabber/XMPP multi-user chatroom in the form <samp>chatroom@conference.example.net</samp>
